items.content_html: A simple, lightweight tool for API documentation and testing, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ideal for visualizing, interacting with, and evaluating API endpoints and responses, it offers a streamlined alternative to complex platforms like Swagger, perfect for small to medium projects.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight note-taking web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to create, edit, and delete notes effortlessly. It stores notes locally using the browser's localStorage, making it easy to access saved notes even after a page refresh.
items.title: yashdchintawar/notes-taking-app: A simple and lightweight note-taking web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to create, edit, and delete notes effortlessly. It stores notes locally using the browser's localStorage, making it easy to access saved notes even after a page refresh.
